admission_id.description: Unique identifier for each patient admission, created by combining patient_id and date_of_admission

patient_id.description: Unique identifier for each patient, created via hashing the name, age, gender and blood_type of a patient

name.description: Patient's name must be a string.

age.description: Age must be a string containing numeric values only.

blood_type.description: Blood type must be a valid blood type.

medical_condition.description: Medical condition must be a string.

date_of_admission.description: Date of admission must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

doctor.description: Doctor's name must be a string.

hospital.description: Hospital name must be a string.

insurance_provider.description: Insurance provider name must be a string.

billing_amount.description: Billing amount must be a string containing numeric values.

room_number.description: Room number must be a string containing numeric values.

admission_type.description: Admission type must be either 'Emergency', 'Elective' or 'Urgent'.

discharge_date.description: Discharge date must be in the format YYYY-MM-DD.
